column4: Hey, I had to install the ubuntu dapper server version because both text and graphical installs suck, and I cant get X to work, I did a sudo apt-get install gdm and its dependencies were satisfied but X still wont work, I get a bunch of bull when I start my comp and do startx. Help?
wow, that has got to be the most PRECISE TECHNICAL description of a problem I have ever read ... </sarcasm>
you haven't really told us anything.
